snippet: Perhaps people who acted heroically during Hurricane Sandy can be emulated by mayoral candidates, who should face the challenges of global warming that Governor Cuomo discusses.
abstract: Michael Powell Gotham column questions whether candidates in New York City's 2013 mayoral race can fight the reality that the next mayor's agenda has been delivered--rising sea levels caused by global warming.
lead_paragraph: Perhaps people who acted heroically during Hurricane Sandy can be emulated by mayoral candidates, who should face the challenges of global warming that Governor Cuomo discusses.

headline.seo: The Storm Had Heroes, but Can the Mayoral Campaign?
headline.main: Some Rose to Greatness in the Disaster. Could That Happen in the ’13 Campaign?
headline.print_headline: Some Rose to Greatness in the Disaster. Could That Happen in the ’13 Campaign?
